mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ZTHH_MENUCONTROL (URL, METHOD, ROLE_ID, id, log_yn, del_yn, create_id, create_dt, update_id, update_dt) VALUES (#{url}, #{method}, #{roleId}, #{id}, #{logYn}, 'N', #{createId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{updateId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.delete: UPDATE ZTHH_MENUCONTROL SET del_yn = 'Y', update_dt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
